MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: 1) Added option to download 5-Year CAR Pack (free), 2) Added online help, 3) Audi 2013, Chrysler 2013, Nissan 2012 are featured, 4) Car Server has specs for 841 cars from 54 automakers.

English.Keywords: Car Explorer, cars, car shopping, car marketing, XCD format, CAR file, Car Server
English.Char_Desc_45: Makes easy to select your favorite cars.
English.Char_Desc_80: Makes easy to select your favorite cars, avoid common mistakes when shopping.
English.Char_Desc_250: Makes easy to select your favorite cars and helps you to avoid most common mistakes. Makes use of the open XCD car description format that groups cars by Year and Make into CAR files. You can download 5-Year CAR Pack to have all major car specs.
English.Char_Desc_450: Surfing online for a car can be irksome and frustrating. Car Explorer facilitates the process and helps you to avoid most common mistakes before visiting dealerships. The program makes use of the open XCD car description format that groups cars by Year and Make (car manufacturer). You can download for free 5-Year CAR Pack to have all major car specs. The results of analysis are stored as Favorites, and always at your fingertips.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Surfing online for a car can be irksome and frustrating. Car Explorer facilitates the process and helps you to avoid most common mistakes before visiting dealerships. The program makes use of the open XCD car description format that groups cars by Year and Make (car manufacturer). You can download for free 5-Year CAR Pack to have all major car specs. With Car Explorer you take advantage from the simple organization of car data covering all carmakers, and from fast and simple one-click analysis over all car manufactures that interest you. The results of analysis are stored as Favorites, and always at your fingertips.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: One is encouraged to upload this software on as many sites as possible except for commercial purposes.
